xml.data:
Home » 17A10 Dasakanipātapāḷi » 4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 4.4 Ariyamaggavagga
4.4.5 Uppādetabbadhammasutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Ariyamaggavagga
Uppādetabbadhammasutta
193.
1367“Uppādetabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na uppādetabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, na uppādetabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  micchādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na uppādetabbo dhammo.
1368Katamo ca, bhikkhave, uppādetabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe…  sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, uppādetabbo dhammo”ti.
1369Pañcamaṃ.
<< 4.4.4 Sappurisadhammasuttaup4.4.6 Āsevitabbadhammasutta >>
